Name: Space Bound
About the game: Space Bound is a Strategy Arcade Shooter featuring fast paced action, intense boss fights, campaign with 5 worlds, an endless mode with 5 difficulties, and a local multiplayer. Has Keyboard, Playstation, and Xbox controller support. Keyboard Controls: Movement - ASDW Shoot - Spacebar Boost - Alt
